text: Cook the bacon until it is crispy. Drain any excess oils and crumble the bacon into pieces. Season the hamburger patties. Cook the hamburgers, using a grill or oven, until thoroughly done. Add the peanut butter to a bowl. Heat it in a microwave for about 30 to 60 seconds; just enough to spread it easily. Assemble the burger.  Spread the mayonnaise to both sides of the bun.  Add the burger to the bottom bun. Layer the lettuce, onion on top. Slowly pour about 2-3 tablespoons of the peanut butter on top.  Top the burger off with a few bacon pieces.  Finished.
